entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer If you’re bashing President Trump over the .00001% odds of you contracting Coronavirus, but you’re for tens of thousands of unknown people crossing our border each month, from unknown parts of the globe, with unknown health conditions, the odds are 99.999% that you’re a Democrat.
